text.text_translated:
Some people write their dreams down. They think this helps them have a lucid dream.

A lucid dream is a special dream. In a lucid dream, you know you are dreaming. You can also make choices to change the dream.

So, you can change a bad dream. You can make it a nice dream. Or you can control the story of your dream. You are like a film director.

You are not just understanding your dreams. You are making them. But maybe you still want to have some normal dreams. These dreams can show you what you are thinking about.
